data.title: FREE Fill Dirt
data.description:
I have 3 bags of fill dirt in my driveway, free for whoever needs it. The bags are 1 cubic yard each and sitting on pallets. If you have a skeer-loader, they can easily be loaded onto a truck bed without the need for shovels. 
Email if interested.
